main event: An oblong object with a tail, resembling a baseball bat, was observed in the sky and appeared to hit the ground in a northwest direction.
interesting points: The object was yellow or orange in color.,The observer's wife noticed the object first and called for them to look.,The object seemed to separate at times during observation.,The sighting lasted between 6 to 3 seconds.,A check revealed that a meteor had fallen west-northwest of St. Louis, Missouri.
witness description: The witness was driving west on Page Boulevard when they observed the object.
